content:
Project Name
Client
Brief Description
Key Analyses
Employee Utilization Dashboard
Digital media broadcasting 
and company
Collaborated with Corporate team to build a DOMO based 
dashboard to help them to track the employee utilization 
across line of business
Tracking the employee's utilization 
for elapsed months and forecasting 
the  utilization for next 6 months
1
SUCCESS STORIES - SUMMARY

UTILIZATION DASHBOARD
SITUATION
▪In addition, the company wanted to track and monitor employee utilization across Line of Business, Project Types and Locations.
▪Integrated the employee work hours data from Workday and project staffing data from NetSuite platforms into DOMO platform and created process 
flow to have unified view into work hours for elapsed months and allocated hours for future months.
▪Tracking the Headcount, Employee utilization % and adherence to Timesheet submission across various Groups (created based on Location, Line of 
Business and Owner) in a consolidated dashboard.
▪Forecasted employee’s utilization for the next 6 months based current project plan and staffing data.
▪Tracked the Budgeted Hours vs. Actual Hours and vs. Allocated Hours of each employee on client’s billable projects for past months and future 
months respectively.
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
▪Helped the client in tracking utilization % and identifying gaps in timesheets submission by employees.
▪Ensured approval of timesheets on Workday platform is tracked and streamlined.
▪Helped the client in estimate bandwidth needs for the next 6 months by LOB, Location and Project to ensure proactive resource management.
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Client, digital media and broadcasting company in North America with various line of businesses operating across the globe had a challenge in tracking their employee’s utilization 
in an executive dashboard.
2

Overall utilization % of employees across Line 
of Business, Project Types, Location and Hub.
Employee's utilization at different project 
types and # of pending weekly timesheets 
submissions
UTILIZATION DASHBOARD #1
3

Summary of Headcount, pending timesheets, timesheets submit % and timesheets approved % at different groups (created based on Location, Line of 
Business and Owner) to identify gaps in timesheets submission by employees and approvals by owners
UTILIZATION DASHBOARD #2
4

Forecasting the employee’s 
utilization for future 6 months 
based on allocated hours on 
client projects
Tracking the Budgeted Hours 
vs. Actual/Allocated Hours 
spent by employees on 
billable client projects
